summary: a new challenging dungeon and quest to explore. Join Dgearven to solve the mystery of the great core which is considered a myth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]
[img]https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E6reqShSrlQ/V3BhHIvG7qI/AAAAAAAABOo/4CU4gMIu9mc98talYMfXvlGRSLNL2vJoACKgB/s1600/IntroNexus900.jpg[/img]
[color=#00ff00]

The Legend Of Azkaruelgraz[/color][/size][/b]
 
The story is about Karaan Dardurian the former leader of the Dgearven (trading and private army
organization) looking for strong warrior carry out the dangerous quest for him
to searching the dwemer's mystery artifact, the great core believed to capable
of controlling an ancient automaton. At the same time his brother, Hedesin who
lead the Scavenger Collector going after the same myth.
 
The Legend OfAzkaruelgraz is not lore-friendly Mod which include a main quest as a primary
story and four small quest. To begin the quest, player need to talk with the
guard at main entrance. The location of main quest located at Riverwood. There
is a two npc follower can join player but need to be a part of the main quest
first. Before that, [color=#00ffff]player need to turn on the sub title[/color] because the mod
doesn't have any custom voice for npc.

 
[b][color=#00ff00][size=4]The Follower[/size][/color][/b]
 
The follower includedof this DLC Mod is quite different which need a player to join the main quest
before asking them going out for adventure. The follower is Soomikha and Amur.
Both of them has own armor and weapon accept for Amur need an armor to
strenghten his defensive ability. Player doesn't need to buy an extra equipment
and just bring their level highest as possible. To ask Soomikha to join, just
accept the main quest by talk to the guard. For Amur, finish the main quest
first and talk to Karaan again. Player will be forced to fighting Amur but
avoid killing him. One more thing, both of them are immortal.

 
[color=#00ff00][size=4]Other things[/size][/color]
 
This mod included anew enhance weapon and armor and not only that, player can create and upgrade
the new enhance equipment by using Dgearven benchworks. If player explore the
Azkaruelgraz ruin, player can find the hidden special equipment.
 

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Known Issue[/size][/color]
 
There is something wierd happen to Soomikha. She almost naked all of time. This only happen if
player meet her inside Dgearven only. This is because i'm work with script
involving bath event. Another thing is, both of the follower using auto
swapping system which can change equiptment automatically during combat. Given
that my script are not quite perfect, sometime their equipment remain on
container and cannot be remove automatically. This happen especially for Amur.
If this happen, player need to type command [color=#00ffff]"openactorcontainer 1"[/color] at
him. Doing this can avoid failure during combat. So far I doesn't have any
solution for both problem.
  
 
[color=#00ff00][size=4]The Quest[/size][/color]
 
Legend OfAzkaruelgraz - Npc Karaan
Karaan Nemesis - Npc Karaan
Won't Give up - Npc Karaan
Six Damnation - Npc Soomikha
Remove The Collector- Npc Coffenius

 
[color=#ff7700][size=4]Installation Requirement[/size][/color]
 
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
 
 
[color=#ff7700][size=4]Special Thank For Those Below[/size][/color]
 
Bethesda
